saga::cpr::metrics

saga::cpr::metrics Namespace Reference

Detailed Description

Available metrics defined for the CPR API package.

Most cp::job metrics are inherited from the job::job class, and only four are added to simplify application level checkpoiint management: checkpoint, checkpointed, recover, and recovered.

Usage example:

//TODO
